description: Working with an international team, I collaborate on projects that involve OpenAI services (Generative AI), document-intelligence and developing data-driven applications. I am currently in the Digital Emerging Technologies team, delivering advanced technological solutions.
Main developer for a platform that enabled the company's commercial team to create custom demos for the different products, with specific configurations for potencial clients.
Developer for an asset-tracking platform, with IoT and blockchain integration, working with TypeScript/Angular and Java Spring Boot  with MongoDB.
